title: What are some cute 1-year anniversary ideas for him? - Quora

response.answer_text: The traditional theme for first anniversary gifts is paper. One really fun paper gift idea would be tickets to an event - sports, concert, theatre or anything else. Beyond that, you could get him a book or maybe some playing cards. Or, you can get him something that is not paper itself but closely related to paper. Perhaps an all in one printer/scanner/copier or a Montblanc pen. If you are looking for more ideas, here are 28 paper anniversary gifts for him that might work for your first anniversary.

Hello, We scoured the internet in search of the most special, unique, and creative first year wedding anniversary gift ideas. We then compiled these 1-year anniversary gift ideas into a thorough and detailed blog post (linked above). These gifts ideas include traditional 1 year anniversary gifts (read: paper anniversary gifts) OR, you can choose to go more modern and check out gift ideas that are guaranteed to make him smile. These gifts vary in price and style so you’ll be sure to find something that is perfect for your guy. This post is easy to navigate and includes a table of contents so you can jump straight to the recommendations. We hope these gift ideas are helpful and make your anniversary a day to remember forever. Cheers, Defeating Divorce
